query.name: statistics
query.cql: SELECT time, COUNT(car_id) AS volume, MIN(speed) AS min_speed, MAX(speed) AS max_speed, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM positionreport [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 3 SECONDS]

query.name: segvol
query.cql: SELECT time, way, dir, seg, COUNT(car_id) AS volume FROM positionreport [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 3 SECONDS] GROUP OVER [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 3 SECONDS] BY way, dir, seg

query.name: segavgspeed
query.cql: SELECT time, way, dir, seg, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM positionreport GROUP OVER [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 3 SECONDS] BY way, dir, seg

query.name: segementtoll_intermediate
query.cql: SELECT segvol.way AS way, segvol.dir AS dir, segvol.seg AS seg, segvol.volume AS volume, segvol.time AS vol_time, segavgspeed.time AS avgspeed_time, segavgspeed.avg_speed AS avg_speed FROM segvol [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 3 SECONDS] JOIN segavgspeed [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 3 SECONDS] ON segvol.way = segavgspeed.way AND segvol.dir = segavgspeed.dir AND segvol.seg = segavgspeed.seg WHERE segavgspeed.avg_speed > 40

query.name: segementtoll
query.cql: SELECT vol_time AS time, way AS way, dir AS dir, seg AS seg, vol_time AS vol_time, avgspeed_time AS avgspeed_time, 15 * (volume - 150) * (volume - 150) AS toll FROM segementtoll_filter

query.name: curactivecars
query.cql: SELECT time AS time, car_id AS car_id, COUNT(car_id) AS car_count FROM positionreport GROUP OVER [RANGE 6 SECONDS SLIDE 1 SECONDS] BY car_id

query.name: newcarentry
query.cql: SELECT time AS time, car_id AS car_id FROM curactivecars WHERE car_count = 1

query.name: newcarentryseg
query.cql: SELECT positionreport.time AS time, positionreport.car_id AS car_id, positionreport.way AS way, positionreport.dir AS dir, positionreport.seg AS seg FROM positionreport [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 5 SECONDS] JOIN newcarentry [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 5 SECONDS] ON newcarentry.car_id = positionreport.car_id

query.name: cartoll
query.cql: SELECT newcarentryseg.car_id AS car_id, segementtoll.toll AS toll, segementtoll.way AS way, segementtoll.dir AS dir, segementtoll.seg AS seg FROM newcarentryseg [ROWS 1 SLIDE 1] JOIN segementtoll [RANGE 30 SECONDS SLIDE 5 SECONDS] ON newcarentryseg.way = segementtoll.way AND newcarentryseg.dir = segementtoll.dir AND newcarentryseg.seg = segementtoll.seg
